title: About
text: exp. design's mission is to create outstanding digital experiences for social impact organizations using research, strategy, design, and tech.

My name is Devon Hirth and my experience ranges from design research to prototyping and implementation. Currently, I'm helping low-income New Yorkers address consumer debt with tech solutions at daisydebt.org. As a designer and engineer I have come up against many challenges, both creative and technical, and I derive a great deal of satisfaction overcoming them. One of the skills I value the most is being able to listen to people and use their insight to solve complex problems.
Find out more about me on LinkedIn and be sure to follow exp. design on Facebook or Twitter.
Please feel free to reach out to me about contract opportunities.
